review: just like the first game in the series this one also feels great and is a lot of fun both characters have unique playstyles and makes you want to do 2 playthroughs for each of them the story felt a bit all over the place but it was still nice to learn what happened before the first game if you enjoy simple shooters with a unique theme definitely give this game a try you wont regret it
